title: SUMMONERS CAN BE HEROES TOO??

embed.description: This game is the best Moba and it needs to take off it is a DC comics Moba named Infinite Crisis by signing this you will show your support to get Turbine to keep going or for Warner Bros to change it to some else to pick it up

body:
This game has very high potential and had high hopes when it was released.

Unfortunately Turbine games shut it down before the community had a chance to grow.

and like all the greatest moba games out there it needs time to grow, to strive , to bring gamers together, to create good times for players, to help people going through hard times, and to give people a chance to be passionate again.

Last year during august the chance to get this game back reached a hold and we couldn't get anymore people to sign the petition 
every one gave up but the truth is that nobody ever gives up on something that their passionate about.
Everyone but me i didn't give up on this game while everyone was switching and playing different mobas like smite and lol
i was fighting for this game and to tell u the truth this game got me into lol riot should be thanking this game for getting so many people to join the moba community and join there community.

But theirs another truth a much darker truth...

the last time i actually enjoyed a game felt that dopamine hipe and excitement, PLAYED A GAME ALL NIGHT BECAUSE IT WAS SO FUN AND ADDICTING...... was the last time i played this game.

im gonna be honest LOL was fun but it wasn't worth the pain it turned me into a monster it made me obnoxiously rude and disrespectful towards my mother it made me lose grades in school it wasted so much of my life, and it wasn't good it was like a drug and although i have myself to blame for this it was a toxic community but it was a great community at times although

the game diffidently has hidden mechanics that riot doesn't tell u that if your not careful can change u, can make u a horrible human being
it has mechanics that make u tilt and it has all these little mechanics that u cant see that come together that make u angry.

I got to a point where i was playing the game not because i enjoyed it but because i was soley addicted to getting to diamond to feeling like i was good like i was worth something but u know what i didn't because i realized that the games wasn't for me because this is what it wanted not what i wanted.

U failed Riot... i am a DC Fan like my Father before me.

(star wars reference)

So pls everyone who respects mobas please sign this petition, not because i want u 2 or because u hate riot or u feel pity on me
but because u believe Mobas can bring fun because mobas can bring people together so this game might one day bring DC fans and gamers together make opportunities for esports
save people from depression invent a new genre of a gaming.

WHAT DO U FIGHT FOR?

ill see u guys in coast city

Will u guys fight with me?
